description:
A.D. 1982, the planet alignment brought the human beings ordeal we should overcome, and it caused a convulsion on the Earth. During the conflict, a light fell on to the Myojinsho reef, and five lights scattered around the Earth as if they followed it.
17 years had passed since then. A.D. 1999, human beings had developed all of the solar system, and began to embark for outer space. The Earth Defense Army organized an elite squad, Crasher, to provide for various happening in space. Myojin Takeru was the member of the team. He was found in the light fell on to the Myojinsho reef. Actually he was Mars who was born on the planet Gishin. When he grew up, he heard unearthly voice:
"Mars, stop the Earthians` advancement to the space. Explode the Earth."
He was a living triggering device that had been sent by Emperor Zure, who plotted to conquer the universe. However, Mars, who had been raised as an Earthian, rejected the order, and made up his mind to face the severe fate.
Source: AnimeNfo

REGULAR.description:
Takeru Myojin is visited by the evil Emperor Zule of Planet Gishin, who claims to be his father in his dreams. In his dream, Emperor Zule reveals Takeru was sent to Earth to destroy it, but Takeru rejects his orders and brushes it off as just a dream.
Source: crunchyroll

To find out the truth, Takeru visits his parents’ home. There, his father, Professor Myojin reveals Takeru is not his biological son. Suddenly, his parents’ home comes under attack by another assassin from Planet Gishin, who possesses Esper powers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: There! The threatening six gods unite
でた! 脅威の六神合体

REGULAR.description:
After analyzing Gaia’s command capsule, Commissioner Otsuka discovers its secret. While the other Crasher Squad members leave for battle, Takeru is ordered to stay behind and is kept in confinement.
Source: crunchyroll

The other Crasher Squad members are suspicious of Takeru, due to his Esper power and mysterious ability to control Gaia. Now, Takeru must face the Gishin assassin alone.
Source: crunchyroll

After hearing his fellow Crasher Squad members say they cannot fight alongside a Gishinian, Takeru takes off into space with Gaia. However, using Takeru’s absence on Earth as an opportunity to strike, the enemy attacks Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さらば! 愛する地球よ

REGULAR.description:
The Gishinians finally discover where the Six God robots are stationed. They attack Egypt where Sphinx, the body unit of God Mars, is located. The Crasher Squad is sent as reinforcement and a battle ensues.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Six gods: Unable to Combine ?

REGULAR.description:
A giant space fleet has left Earth to construct a base on Pluto and the Crasher Squad has been assigned to guard the fleet. However, Takeru hears a mysterious voice in his head urging him not to go to Pluto.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pluto is the Planet of Hell !

REGULAR.description:
Takeru bombs the Spaceport and a young boy, who admires Takeru, witnesses him in the act. With pictures to prove his guilt, Takeru is taken into custody. With Takeru out of the way, the Gishinians’ ships approach Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

A massive earthquake triggers Tokyo to slowly sink. However, the earthquakes do not seem like a natural occurring earthquake. What is causing the earthquakes and can Takeru stop Tokyo from sinking beneath the sea?
Source: crunchyroll

Takeru and Namida head to the Space Control Center to secretly investigate the cause of the frequent collisions between spaceships. The Director of the Space Control Center and his granddaughter welcome them.
Source: crunchyroll

A mysterious voice alerts Takeru that the Gishinians are plotting to assassinate the President. However, it was a trap laid out by Sagule, the Gishinian Spy Commander, in order to find out who is behind the mysterious voice.
Source: crunchyroll

Marg is finally captured for treason and is ordered to kill Takeru in exchange for his life. Meanwhile, back at Battle Camp, Takeru receives a transmission from the mysterious voice, wishing to see him on Saturn.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 対決! マーズとマーグ

REGULAR.description:
Marg is recaptured and taken back to Planet Gishin. A devastated Takeru chases after his brother, but the evil Emperor Zule appears and stands in his way. Faced with Emperor Zule’s invincible power, will Takeru be able to defeat Zule and get back Marg?
Source: crunchyroll

Marg, whose memory has been erased by Emperor Zule, becomes a Gishinian Commander. His mission is to kill Takeru, the traitor. Meanwhile, back at Battle Camp on Earth, the Gishinian spies have taken Shizuko and Namida hostage.
Source: crunchyroll

Marg, who has been stationed at the frontline as a Gishinian Commander, launches a series of attacks on Earth’s major cities. Takeru fights the Gishinians with all this might.
Source: crunchyroll

The moon base is under attack and the Crasher Squad is dispatched as reinforcement. Meanwhile, Lozé, Marg’s Lieutenant, infiltrates the moon base and takes over Mika’s body. Lozé begins sabotaging the base from the inside, but is found out by Takeru.
Source: crunchyroll

Takeru and Mika are shocked when they learn Akira has a new girlfriend. On his girlfriend’s request, Akira shows Akane around the base, but it’s all a trap. Once inside, Akane begins planting bombs throughout the base.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akira`s Girlfriend is a Woman Warrior!
アキラの恋人は女戦士

REGULAR.description:
Takeru visits a secret base on the South Pole that’s researching the Warp Catapult. However, his visit is cut short when he learns that Battle Camp under attack by Marg.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The South Pole is Takeru`s Grave!
南極はタケルの墓場だ!

REGULAR.description:
Takeru and Marg are locked in a fierce and decisive battle. During the battle, Marg regains his memories and their hearts connect once again. However, their reunion is short lived, as fate separates Takeru and Marg once again, this time forever.
Source: crunchyroll

In order to avenge Marg, Lozé takes Commissioner Otsuka and Shizuko hostage and challenges Takeru to a duel. To secure his mother and the Commissioner’s safety, Takeru accepts Lozé’s challenge.
Source: crunchyroll

Planet Gishin has taken control of an icy planet and the Crasher Squad is deployed to save its enslaved people.
Source: crunchyroll

Touched by Takeru’s kindness, Lozé begins to doubt her reasons for serving Emperor Zule. A conflicted Lozé visits her home planet and is inadvertently captured by a guerrilla squad that is fighting the Gishinians.
Source: crunchyroll

The Crasher Squad heads to Planet Gishin to negotiate a peace treaty with Emperor Zule. However, the Crasher Squad becomes engaged in a fierce battle against the Gishinian fighter squad.
Source: crunchyroll

The Crasher Squad is caught in a space storm and makes an emergency landing on a planet disguised as Planet Gishin. Emperor Zule suddenly appears before the Crasher Squad and attacks them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 反陽子爆弾・バクハツ!?

REGULAR.description:
The Crasher Squad finally lands on Planet Gishin. However, the evil Emperor Zule is determined to defeat Takeru, even if it means destroying Planet Gishin along with him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 新たな絆・別れ・出発!

REGULAR.description:
A month has past since the battle on Planet Gishin. The Crasher Squad, who has been newly assigned to Ceres Space Station, rescues a girl named Flore out in space.
Source: crunchyroll

Flore, a negative Esper, shows nothing but intense animosity against Takeru, who is a positive Esper. Then, a ship from Planet Marmelo appears and demands they hand over Flore.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: プラス対マイナスの運命

REGULAR.description:
A mysterious pirate ship suddenly appears near the space station, as though they were guided by Flore’s telepathy. Gash, the pirate gang leader and his men infiltrate the space station.
Source: crunchyroll

Takeru learns Flore is sending her telepathic messages to her fellow negative Espers, who escaped from Planet Marmelo before her. Gash, the pirate leader, appears with his pirate ship and claims Flore is their fellow comrade.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: フローレの危険な仲間

REGULAR.description:
Flore leaves Ceres Space Station to determine if the people onboard the pirate ship are truly her comrades. She confirms Gash and his pirates are fellow negative Espers, but she can’t bring herself to join a ruthless band of pirates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 一人ぼっちのフローレ

REGULAR.description:
Flore finally opens up to the Crasher Squad and reveals the tragic fate of the negative Espers born on Planet Marmelo. Then, Ceres Space Station receives a transmission from Planet Marmelo.
Source: crunchyroll

Planet Marmelo declares war on Earth. Takeru and Flore are held responsible for the outbreak of war and are imprisoned. Meanwhile, the Marmelonian Forces begin an all out attack on Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

Gash tells a captive Flore the wretched life the negative Espers were subjected to by the positive Espers. Meanwhile, Takeru heads to space alone to rescue Flore. Led by Flore’s presence, Takeru and Gash come face to face on an asteroid belt.
Source: crunchyroll

The Cosmo Crasher is under attack by the Marmelonian Forces and Takeru is determined to save his friends. However, Takeru who is hit by the Brainwave Disrupter Rays is unable to combine the Six God robots.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: マーズ, 死ぬのは早い!

REGULAR.description:
The Earth Forces launch an attack on Gash’s pirate ship to take back Flore in hopes of handing her over to Planet Marmelo and thus ending the war. However, the Earth Forces are defeated and Takeru is taken captive during the battle.
Source: crunchyroll

Flore heads to Planet Marmelo to find out if Gyron, the ruler of Planet Marmelo, is her father. However, she becomes lost in a dark nebula, known as the space cemetery. Takeru dives into the space cemetery to save Flore.
Source: crunchyroll

Takeru and Flore land on Planet Marmelo and with the help of Shikeel, Planet Marmelo’s spiritual leader, Flore is reunited with her mother, Armo.
Source: crunchyroll

Takeru and Flore head to the palace to see Gyron in order to convince him to stop the persecution of negative Espers and to stop the needless attacks on Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 父, ギロンとの出会い

REGULAR.description:
Upon his return to Earth, Takeru is suddenly dismissed from the Earth Defense Force. In despair, Takeru disappears along with God Mars. Shortly after, the Galilei Base is destroyed by God Mars.
Source: crunchyroll

Takeru tries to return to Earth, but is stopped by the Crasher Squad. The Earth Defense Forces were still under the impression that Takeru had destroyed the Galilei Base.
Source: crunchyroll

Takeru joins the Crasher Squad once again after Naoto proved his innocence. Meanwhile, Gash and his pirate ship fleet leaves for Planet Marmelo, but come under attack by the Marmelonian Forces, which outnumber and outgun his ships.
Source: crunchyroll

Gash is determined to defeat Gyron, the ruler of Planet Marmelo and refuses the Crasher Squad’s help. Meanwhile, Gyron captures Shikeel, the spiritual leader of Planet Marmelo, who sides with the rebels, and prepares his execution to lure out Gash.
Source: crunchyroll

Gash is determined to defeat Gyron, the ruler of Planet Marmelo and refuses the Crasher Squad’s help. Meanwhile, Gyron captures Shikeel, the spiritual leader of Planet Marmelo, who sides with the rebels, and prepares his execution to lure out Gash.
Source: crunchyroll

Gash infiltrates the enemy base alone to save Mika, an uncharacteristic move for a man who is known for his ruthlessness. After rescuing Mika, the two escape on a snowmobile, but the enemy stands in their way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ガッシュ, 安らかに眠れ

REGULAR.description:
Gyron orders the deployment of the powerful Magnetic Cannon to destroy God Mars. Kiel, the inventor of the Magnetic Cannon, adamantly opposes its use, as it will greatly alter Planet Marmelo’s geomagnetic field.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゴッドマーズが危ない!

REGULAR.description:
Realizing God Mars will come undone, Takeru decides to attack the enemy base with the Six Robots separately. The Marmelonian Forces use the Magnetic Cannon to defeat Takeru once more, but are unable to keep up with Gaia’s speed.
Source: crunchyroll

Flore rushes to the palace to put an end to the battle against Gyron, her father. Realizing Planet Marmelo is on the brink of destruction, Gyron flees the palace while dodging Flore and Takeru’s attacks.
Source: crunchyroll

Planet Marmelo’s destruction is now only a matter of time. When all hope seemed lost, its twin planet, the Planet of Death, had suddenly transformed into a habitable planet before their very eyes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 危機せまるマルメロ星!

REGULAR.description:
Gyron’s forces have entered the solar system and are quickly approaching Saturn. Kenji, who has been newly assigned as the Commander of the Earth Defense Force, battles against the enemy forces.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ギロン, 地球を狙う

REGULAR.description:
The Earth Defense Forces are engaged in a battle against Gyron’s forces from invading Earth. Takeru and the Crasher Squad fight bravely, but the enemy succeeds in destroying Ceres Space Station.
Source: crunchyroll

With Takeru’s help, Flore finally defeats Gyron. However, Flore hesitates to kill her father at the very last moment. Suddenly, a mysterious power kills Gyron. Thus, ending the war.
Source: crunchyroll

The war against Gyron is finally over. Then one day, Lozé visits Earth. She is aware that Takeru is cursed with Zule’s Devil Rings and that his life is in danger.
Source: crunchyroll

Takeru is cursed with Zule’s Devil Rings, which drains his life force every time he uses his Esper powers. Meanwhile, a meteor lands in the Indian Ocean close to Titan, one of the God Mars robots.
Source: crunchyroll

Takeru and Lozé were visiting Marg’s grave in the South Pole when they receive word that Namida has gone missing. Namida was out on an expedition searching for UFOs in Greenland.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 別離! タケルとロゼ

REGULAR.description:
Emperor Zule’s warriors burn the Amazon with their Esper Robots. Their plot is to suffocate the Earth by burning its rainforests. Takeru desperately tries to extinguish the wild fires while fighting Zule’s warriors.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 炎の中にマーグを見た

REGULAR.description:
With death approaching, Takeru was feeling pressed about the possibility of not being able to defeat Zule and takes his frustration out on his fellow squad members.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Defeat the enemy in your heart

REGULAR.description:
Zule plots to send a meteor crashing into Earth. The Crasher Squad heads to space to destroy the meteor but comes under attack.
Source: crunchyroll

Thinking only about the war against Zule, Takeru has forgotten what it’s like to have inner peace. Meanwhile, the enemy creates a massive sandstorm that reaches the stratosphere.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: When will peace of mind come?
心のやすらぎは... いつに

REGULAR.description:
Noah, the main computer that controls every aspect of the Earth Defense Force Headquarters is taken over by the enemy and begins wreaking havoc.
Source: crunchyroll

Shizuko learns Takeru does not have much longer to live. Taking advantage of Shizuko’s love for her son, Zule lures her to Angkor Wat in exchange for sparing Takeru’s life.
Source: crunchyroll

Takeru collapses and is carried into the hospital after fighting the enemy on this eighteenth birthday. The Crasher Squad members are stunned when they finally learn the truth about Takeru’s condition.
Source: crunchyroll

Naoto and Namida were out investigating the deep ocean trenches lying east of Japan on a submarine when they come under attack. In order to save Naoto and Namida, Takeru fights the enemy but is pinned down by a massive robot that’s about to crush him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Fate of the Rose Knight

REGULAR.description:
With Lozé’s help, Takeru realizes “the fiery planet that burns the sky” that Marg was referring to was the sun. It’s where Zule was holding Marg’s soul captive. Takeru dives into the sun and battles Zule, but the Devil Rings’ cruse stands in his way.
Source: crunchyroll

Emperor Zule’s warriors, the Gestalt Six, attack Takeru near the Hawaiian Islands. As proof Takeru did not defeat Emperor Zule, the Gestalt Six combine and a giant Zule appears before Takeru. The final battle between Zule and Takeru begins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 銀河へはじめての笑顔を

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 六神合体ゴッドマーズ

3771.name: recycled animation -- TO BE SPLIT AND DELETED

titles.title: 六神合体ゴッドマーズ
